name: A Weird Quest
description:
Introduction

A little girl lost her soul in a dark and dangerous world, and the Detective decided to save her.

Play as the Detective, solve puzzles, unveil secrets, and defeat the Devil.  The puzzles in this game will be difficult to some extent ( 99% of those players who did an alpha test said they got stuck at the beginning) and you may pull your hair at some point, then thinking outside the box may help you find the answer.

Attention

This game also contains some elements that might be terrifying, so I added a horror tag to this game. If you don't like this art style and give up, I totally understand.

I worked alone in this game, so this game could have some bugs that I haven't discovered. If you guys find any, just leave a comment below or send an email to me at here. I will try my best to fix it. 

Bonus
In this game, the gameplay is simple, the storyline is common, the art style is retro, but to collect the full list of achievements requires logical thinking, trail, and sometimes creativity.

I will upload a full achievement guide later (maybe after one week), but for everyone who unlocks all achievements in this game before the official guide, you can have the opportunity to play my next game one week earlier than others. I am currently developing another 3D adventure game with my friend for my thesis project.
